statements: DELETE FROM microbiome_data WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND bacteria_name = 'Bacteria1';
DELETE FROM microbiome_data WHERE sample_id = '345e7890-f12c-34a5-b678-901223456789' AND abundance > 0.5;
DELETE FROM microbiome_composition WHERE sample_id = 1 AND species_name = 'Bacteria' AND abundance > 0.5;
DELETE FROM sample_metadata WHERE location = 'California' AND collection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM microbiome_composition WHERE species = 'Bacteria' AND abundance < 0.5;
DELETE FROM microbiome_metadata WHERE genotype = 'Type A';
DELETE FROM patient_metadata WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 30
